Name: Gurobu
About the game: 'GUROBU' is a story-driven, 2D horror game about haunted apartments, ghosts of the past, and a murder mystery. FEATURES 1.5+ hour long. 5 endings! 5 nightmares to explore! Name your cat! CONTROLS: Arrows = Move SPACE, Z or ENTER = Examine / Advance text F4 / ALT+ENTER = Fullscreen ESC, X = Menu / Cancel/Erase (text)
